snippet: In his debate with Bill de Blasio for mayor of New York City, Joseph J. Lhota, who emerged as a knight under Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani, seemed better suited for a city of another era.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column notes Joseph J Lhota, In his debate with Bill de Blasio for mayor of New York City, had emerged as a knight under former Mayor Rudolph W Giuliani, but now seems better suited for a city of another era.
lead_paragraph: In his debate with Bill de Blasio for mayor of New York City, Joseph J. Lhota, who emerged as a knight under Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani, seemed better suited for a city of another era.

headline.main: In a Competitive Dance, Lhota Searches for a Tune
headline.print_headline: In a Competitive Dance, Lhota Searches for a Tune
